name: Nickelodeon Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary: Shredder and the Kraang intend to unleash a devastating mutagen bomb that will transform the citizens of New York City into mindless mutants. Join Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, and Michelangelo in the fight for NYC in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles the videogame. Play as your favorite Turtle Anytime! Join the Turtle Power and battle through 15 action-packed levels. Booyakasha!
info:
